name: Banshee
ability: If the Demon kills you, all players learn this. From now on, you may nominate twice per day and vote twice per nomination.

legacy.otherNightReminder: If the Banshee was killed by the Demon: Announce this publicly.

otherNights.description: If the Demon kills you, all players learn this.

information.customMessage: If killed by Demon, announce to all players.
